## EthersMosaicConnectionOptionalParams interface

Optional parameters of [ReadableEthersMosaic.connect()](./lib-ethers.readableethersmosaic.connect_1.md) and [EthersMosaic.connect()](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaic.connect_1.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EthersMosaicConnectionOptionalParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [frontendTag?](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnectionoptionalparams.frontendtag.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Address that will receive MSIC rewards from newly created Stability Deposits by default. |
|  [userAddress?](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnectionoptionalparams.useraddress.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Address whose Trove, Stability Deposit, MSIC Stake and balances will be read by default. |
|  [useStore?](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md) | [EthersMosaicStoreOption](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicstoreoption.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Create a [MosaicStore](./lib-base.mosaicstore.md) and expose it as the <code>store</code> property. |
